quotes: He served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 2007 to 2010
through his stewardship of the 2009 London G20 summit
In April 2009, he hosted the G20 Summit in London
Previously, he served as Chancellor of the Exchequer from 1997 to 2007
Gordon served as the Labour Member of Parliament for Dunfermline East (1983-2005)
and for Kirkcaldy and Cowdenbeath (2005-2015)
He was elected as Leader of the Labour Party serving from 2007-2010
